title: Gaussian Splatting from AI video
description: Experiment generating a 3D scene using 3D Gaussian Splatting from an AI-generated video.
longDescription: A hands-on exploration converting AI-generated video into a 3D Gaussian Splat representation. Covers data extraction, camera path estimation, and training splat parameters to reconstruct a view-consistent scene. Includes notes on quality tradeoffs, dataset prep, and rendering results.
